description:
10-point crampons for light mountaineering, hiking, trekking, and moderate snow slopes. They're a good option for approaching alpine rock routes or bagging a ski mountaineering objective.

  • Made of aluminum
  • Flexible center bars and soft straps work with approach footwear or hiking boots without rigid soles
  • ABS plates included to prevent snow build up
name: Black Diamond Neve Strap Crampons
